import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(private route:Router){ } navToHome=()=>{ this.route.navigate(["/"]) } }
Art of Creativities

Power looms revolutionized cotton production by increasing efficiency and reducing manual labor. They enable faster weaving of cotton fabric, leading to higher output and lower production costs for the textile industry.

About us

We specialize in crafting high-quality cotton cloth, using sustainable practices from farm to fabric. Our mission is to deliver soft, durable, and eco-friendly cotton textiles that support both comfort and sustainability.

Contact us
+91 8074178839

For inquiries about our cotton cloth products, feel free to reach out to us. We're here to assist you with any questions or orders, ensuring you receive the best in quality and service.
